scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Trinity. God the Father, an elderly bearded man with a halo, is seated on a throne, his hands supporting the crucified Christ. A dove, representing the Holy Spirit, hovers above Christ's head. Christ is shown in a state of suffering on the cross, with his body emaciated and wounds visible. The background is a rich red tapestry with gold ornamentation. The throne is simple and appears to be made of wood.
